content:
Guests of Hotel Caza can enjoy all the comforts of home and more for a $25 plus tax ($29.11) daily Destination Fee. Services included with Destination Fee:

  • High-Speed WiFi – up to 5 device connections
  • Complimentary Flo-Water filling stations and 2 refillable water bottles
  • Complimentary morning local Equator coffee or tea in the lobby
  • Complimentary local calls and toll-free calls
  • Complimentary access to our indoor and outdoor Games and Activities (Available in December)
  • Complimentary use of our 24-hour fitness center
  • Complimentary use of heated outdoor pool (Available late December)
  • VIP discounts on select tours, attractions, and eateries in Fisherman’s Wharf
